Class WordFrequencyUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • WordFrequencyUI

  • public class WordFrequencyUI
extends javafx.application.Application
    This program is a text analyzer that reads a html URL that the user inputs and outputs the word frequencies of all words in the file, sorted by the most frequently used word. The output is displayed in a JavaFX UI table with each pair containing a word and how many times it occurred in the file.
    Author:
    Juan Martinez

      • getWord

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Word> getWord(java.lang.String urlLink)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method gets the list of words from the WordFrequencyFinder class and adds it to the observable list that will be displayed in the UI.
        Parameters:
        urlLink - HTML URL link inputed by the user which the program will analyze.
        Returns:
        words Observable list that will be displayed in the UI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the URL link
